Replies.Reply: Yes, I'm very warm and dry in here, thank you for your concern.
A raise? I already pay you two bucks a day.
PANTUCCI!!  Unperturbed, Pantucci works at the wires.
I'm flying blind here God damn it!
Guilty will be the least of what you feel when I run my rig into one of these god damn no name islands!
If I told you once...I told you a thousand times...
Fok Yu and Fok Yu Two...are we strolling down memory lane for any particular reason?
You know what they say...the classics are eternal.
Right here...middle of nowhere...and the answer to your question is yes.
The one you came up to ask...are we on schedule?
All of them flattering I'm sure.
I don't mind him...but I do think it's time for him to get back down below with the rest of the playgroup.
...this is not a democracy. You don't get a vote.
I'll say it again for the hearing impaired...
20 hours on the clock. Out and back. Double for overtime.
I know it...but you want to get where you want to get, and back? I need a chief engineer, and unless you got a replacement, I'd highly recommend overlooking the indiscretion.
You put me in that position again I'll throw you overboard myself.
I saw these guy perform...at Altmont ...you know that? They opened for the Stones...
Hold still now...I was like three rows back.

Sure I do...I give a shit that at 0300 hour we reach our point of destination. I give a shit that those mojos got to do what they got to do, and 45 minutes later we are turn around and gone. I give a shit that by the time the sun comes up we are all safely tucked in bed.
Oh yeah...and that my stitch job doesn't make you uglier than you already are...this won't hurt a bit...
Leila see what they're up to...
Speedboat in the middle of the ocean...
We can't...we got one engine dead, and the other limping badly.
You're going to have to get a new one.
I think he knows that Joey.
Great woman your mother. Real foresight.
I assume somebody up there has made sure no distress signal can be sent.
Your boys just killed a trolley car Red One.
We're gonna get what we gotta get... do what we gotta do...and get the hell outta here...okay?
The hulls of these things are supposed to be impregnable...
So...If the hull's impregnable why are my feet wet?
I don't know...you got what we need?
It ain't any better out there!
I saved your life is what I did!
I'm their ride.  Trillian hears music to her ears.
You shoot me and you got no ride home...
How do we get out of here?
Why don't you want a message sent?
Because you know a message can't be sent...
You're the inside guy aren't you?
Unless you collected on the insurance...
He's with them.  He motions to the mercenaries.
They rob the joint blind and torpedo it to the bottom. He collects the insurance, and sails off into the sunset clean as a whistle.
It's not going to help us!
I was born in a City housing project in the Bronx OK? It's not in the cards that I die on a luxury cruise ship...now which way up?
All right, be cool, everybody, nice and slow, no sudden moves.
...there's got to be a way to access out back there...
Look lady, I know you people are used to getting your way...
Well, you sure do a good imitation.
Finnegan...John J...now that we've been properly introduced, can we get the hell out of here?
With the emphasis on SELF, and in selfish, right?
Let's get the hell out of here!
The safety...the safety... He flicks the safety on and off.
Boat or no boat... You woulda come back anyway. You're that kind of gal.
Just trying to get to my boat...
Joey, what difference does it make...
If you hear one shot, you know I made it...start coming...
I'll wait here... You go check it out.
Nobody's shooting nobody...come on, just let us through the hatch!

I once saw a guy put a fish in a bottle, then he corked it, sealing it tight, and threw it to a baby octopus. The little sucker felt its way around that bottle, and in less than two minutes, got that cork off, slid inside, and ate that fish.
Us...I'm talking about us... We're the fish.
I don't know what these things are ...all I know is...
They're herding us.  Finnegan and company keep going.
I'm saying they're calling the shots...
Or maybe we're exactly where they want us to be.
We can't do anything for them...
We're going to sink! We've got to get on deck!
You quit high school, lie about your age, join the navy, and next thing you know, four years are up and you need a way to make a living...
It's OK...it's not one of them...
You know what kind of force it took to rip open the bow of this ship? A million little things like this...
...can't exert that kind of pressure... And the way it tracked us? A million little things don't carry portable phones to coordinate positions... What's chasing us...
Will somebody give me a break here?
It's the engine...it can hear the engine...it goes for the loudest sound...
Not unless we kill it first.
There's not much horsepower left in the engines, but there's enough noise...once this baby's set...I'll rev it up...that slimy bastard will come for it like candy...
Jet ski...there's one left up there.
...let's see, it was red wire cross compressor blue wire...or blue cross red?
Just the man I wanted to see. On this puppy here, you remember if it's red to blue or blue to red...
Joey, you want to get sucked out by a giant fucking mutated squid?
You ever operate a jet ski?
Not unless you can wire a missile or fix an engine.
And you got 10 minutes before this thing livens up a boring evening.
Line it up now, nice and easy...
How does an island sound to you?
Second whistle you make it to the deck and get ready to jump...
You're beautiful what you're jealous, you know that, Joey?
Get to the jet ski! Go!
I don't mean to drop in unannounced ...you ready...
Three minutes...I'm not back...no matter what...you go...
You don't take orders very well, do you?
" -- if not for the courage of the fearless crew -- "  He tugs at the wires.
" -- the Minnow would be lost, the Minowwww would be lost."
Can we use our indoor voice please...
You trying to make me feel guilty?
I know...I know...if the cash is there we don't care...
Finnegan this is as mean a pile of shit as we ever carried...
...and some of it's coming your way.
Here's what I think...I think these mokes below are a hit squad.

Right now...there's some bozo sitting on his yacht at those coordinates they gave us, sipping his scotch and soda...totally unawares that we are about to deliver 500 kgs of high power torpedo to light up his ass...that's what's down there in that hold and who knows what the hell else...
You don't give a shit about anything do you?
That's it? That's all you give a shit about?
Jezebel's dead...Hercules is right behind her! We got a gusher in the hull!
What did you do to my kids!!
No! The man in the moon!! Who's driving this thing?
I spent two years building these things...screw your schedule!
With what? Look at them...they need gears...cylinder heads...oil pans... we're in the middle of the goddamn ocean...
Good! So maybe he also know where the hell am I going to get the parts I need...
You know the crew could be armed.
You'd think they'd set a deck watch...
You know what I'm gonna do after this...I'm gonna get a normal life...
What? You don't think I can have a normal life?
Why don't you help us so we can get done faster so we can get the hell out of here?
What's there to think about?? That THING back there...
Finnegan, what the hell was that?
If I don't, I ain't going back to get it...you think we're safe?
What the hell's going on here?
Man, there's something here! On the boat!
Yeah man, no shit, call in the Marines.
Hey I can fix any damn thing...
It's your damn ship! What the hell do you mean you don't know?
I ain't goin' up no more elevators.
What the hell is going on!!
They're catchin' up! They're catchin' up! We gotta slow 'em down!

Feed 'em?!! Okay! All right! Feed 'em what? WHAT ARE WE GONNA FEED  'EM?! Hanover takes his pistol and SHOOTS Pantucci in the leg, BLAM! Pantucci SCREAMS. FALLS into the water.  Hanover RUNS on.  Pantucci doesn't even have time to deal with the pain. He starts SCRAMBLING through the water. UNDERWATER, the INKY FORMS RACE AFTER HIM. Only meters away. Pantucci throws himself into the opening of a dumbwaiter. SLAMS the DOOR SHUT. The TENTACLE ATTACKS the door. WORMING its way across the surface, trying to find a way inside. Pantucci is scared beyond his pain. Pushing back as far as he can against the rear wall, he sees the control button. He presses the up arrow. The dumbwaiter starts to move.
Not even a Joey, I'm glad to see you? Joey, what happened to your leg?
Red cross over to blue double blue ...is that what it is? A squid?
For juice, I gotta rebuild. That's not fast.
Can somebody tell me what the object of the exercise is here?
I've never seen you so congenial with a member of the opposite sex... The two of you got a nice patter going...got a nice rapport...
You know what I think? I think our luck has just about run shit out...
I think we gotta stop floating from one fucked up situation to the next...
I'm telling you, man, we got to give the future some serious thought.
And what have you come up with?
I gerry-rigged the ignition...all you gotta do is start her up...it won't go fast but it'll go loud...
All you're gonna do is get yourself killed...and for what? Some chick?
Was it the water in my eyes or were you guys about to...
Because it's cool, you know, I can always take a walk or something down the beach...
Or I could go for a swim...although, I gotta tell you...if I never get in the water again...
OK...OK...you don't have to beg me ...I'll stick around...
You remember the first time we met Finnegan? I think you were just starting out...smuggling gold off Sumatra for those two Chinese...what did we use to call them?
No, it just struck me as odd...I don't see you for all these years and you've still got the same tape stuck in the box.
And where is our point of arrival?
Take note Mr. Mason...this is why you hire a professional...No whining. No excuses.
That's why we're sill around Finnegan...you and me... Nothing gets the feathers up. Business is business. Eh?
Mr. Billy you're in the batter's box.
We're not savage here Mr. Billy...
This isn't right Finnegan. I've got a contract.
He did...with a crowbar...you know the rules on a broken contract.
How soon can we get up and running?
We were talking about my schedule...
One more joke and your comedy career is over. Now fix this.
Contact verified! You know the drill gentlemen!
Care to see what dreams are made of Finnegan?
When I was a little bit of a pissant we lived down the road from where all the big cruise ships used to come into Sydney harbor...
Mum and me we used to sit by our front door and watch them...she used to say "one day you're going to make your fortune in life on one of them..."
And she could do a hell of a barbie to boot! Belt up. You'll find all the parts you need up there.
I'd say that's a pretty good assumption.
With what? Martinis and tanning oil?
25 minutes...by the numbers. Engine room and machine shop are on the third sub deck...Vivo...Mulligan go with them...keep in touch...move out...
Focus on the task Mr. Chin...
What the hell is going on?
Stay to the schedule. Stay to the plan. Nothing has changed.
Where is everybody?  Trillian is confused --
You tell it straight or I pull the trigger. Who are you?
Mulligan?? What?? I can't hear you?? Repeat I...
This is Red one! Come in Red two!
Shut up! Shut up all of you! Now here's what we're doing... Mamooli is going to take you back to fix your engines, Chin and I are staying here to finish the job...
You hypocritical bastard...all you gave a shit about was the money...
Alright let's move out...you two on point...
Who gives a shit about aft?
You trying to take over my show Finnegan, that what you trying to do?
You stay away from that vault! You hear me?
How do we know you're going to signal...how do we know you're not going to just take off?  Finnegan stops.
Feed them. That'll slow them down.
Help!! Help!!  Pantucci limps around the bar, down a row of one armed bandits... rounds a corner, comes face-to-face with Hanover.
I've heard a lot of stories about you mate...
They were...but they musta been talking about another Finnegan...
I'll take a go and the I vote we throw the little weasel overboard...
Forget her...let's get what we came for and get the hell out of here!
He said an orchid and a beautiful woman belonged together... It was our first date.
He said that it was the orchid I wore that made him fall in love with me...
The best of the best he was... This cruise was supposed to be our 60th anniversary gift to each other. He died last Spring...
I was going to wear one...special for him...like a memory...
But without him here I don't know why I should.
He sounds like a real gentleman.
Because an orchid and a beautiful woman belong together.
Is it true what they say about a captain and his boat.
Madamoiselle...that the bigger the boat...the bigger the man...
In school, the Sisters said testing was my specialty.
And you...Monsieur...you are not a gentleman.
I'm sorry... This area is for authorized personnel only. As the assistant to the Purser, I'm afraid I'll have to ask you to vacate...
Up!! I want to go up!
You're with that other bunch, right?
But if we can at least send a message...
How the hell do we fix it?!
What are you people talking about?
Hey! Hey! Where are you going?
But what makes you think there aren't more of hose...things...back there?
You don't have to be so touchy.
What's that supposed to mean? You people.
Thank you, I work at it...
I heard you say you grew up in the projects in the Bronx...
Projects...South Chicago.  Finnegan ignores her hand.
So this boat of yours...that's what you do? Give people...rides.
Since I'm a kid, I had this dream... I want to own my own tropical island...
I don't know where it is!
Hey! I didn't have to come back.
Oh yeah? What kind is that?
We can't just leave them here.
You won't get her!! You won't!!
So how do you get from the Bronx to the South China sea?
I was so goddamn close, Finnegan!
Oh my god! Oh my god! How do we do it? How do we get there?
You know, Finnegan, I'm starting to believe what you said about you not being born to die on a luxury liner.
...the minute you start your engines ...it's going to kill us, isn't it?
If you blow up your boat, how are we going to get to the island?
How about noise? Can you get noise?
You want ME to go up there?
And what if I run into one of those things?
Don't take too long...I'm not planning on being on the menu tonight.

I'm going to be OK...I'm going to be  OK... The ship's METAL HULL SCREECHES. The SEAWATER BUBBLES and GURGLES. From somewhere deep inside the ship, we HEAR that loud primordial YOWL again. Trillian freezes, her heart double beats. She looks around, really scared.
Oh my God, oh my God.
Soon as I get over the heart attack...
I don't take orders at all.
All my life I had the dream of building the greatest pleasure ship ever to sail the seven seas...
I realize my dream has come true...I thank you all from the bottom of my heart for making it so...
To the Fuji Maru! Good times forever!
You wanted to see me Captain?
Ruin my party? Captain, this ship was built to withstand a typhoon. I can't imagine there's anything on the sea today that could possibly ruin my party.
...what were you planning on doing with it?
Well you can still proceed with your plans then...in prison...Captain... escort the lady...
What the hell is going on?
Ladies and gentlemen...your attention please... Ladies and gentlemen...

This is the most technologically advanced sailing vessel on the water today. Every problem has been anticipated...the Captain has assured me that we will be up and running in no time...so enjoy yourselves...there's nothing to worry about...
Oh my God. I didn't mean to...
I thought it was one of them!
I didn't mean to! I though it was one of them!
It's them! We've got to get off!
It's taking us to the bottom of the ship!
We should get off as soon as possible.
I say we evacuate as soon as...
You can't... All the systems were melted at their core by nitric acid...
My dreams cost more than they would make...I miscalculated the market... there was no way I could recoup...
I never meant for anyone to get hurt ...it was supposed to be clean...
Through there...another sixty, seventy yards...there are more elevators there.
Do we have to go there?
Oh my God, it's going to sink.
I'd like to but I have an appointment with my insurance broker!
Life takes the damndest turns, doesn't it?
Oh we sail the ocean blue, and our mighty ship's a beauty. We are strong men, yes it's true, and responsive to our duty...
It is a theory I would be glad to put to the test.
We have a storm rising behind us...
Switch over to auxiliary power, and run a circuit check.
Remain calm! Stop! Do you hear?
We have to make it to the third deck...
We can't...all the communication systems went down.
This was your life's work...your dreams...
All these people dead!! Because you screwed up on the math??  Finnegan pulls the Captain off.
We're going to die here! We're going to die!
You know what my goal is? Before I die I want to make love to a woman from every country on earth.
What the hell does that mean?
Map...no map...I don't give a shit ...they got women on Samoa, it's on the list.
I vote we slit his throat THEN throw him overboard...
I thought the plan was we'd evacuate them after we got through.
You ain't giving the orders here!
We been down three decks, there's nobody home... Total spooky-town.
Come on...the sooner we get outta here the better I'll feel. Mulligan and Vivo move forward.
Hey! What are you trying to pull!
Why don't you just stop figuring and keep working so we can get the hell out of here?
'Cause grease monkey ain't in my job description dick head...
Will you check it the hell out!!
Touch it and you're dead, asshole!
What happened to Vivo?! What the hell happened to Vivo?
Hanover!...Hanover! Come in! Come in you son-of-a-bitch!
Shut up, man, just shut the hell up! I gotta think! I gotta think!!
There ain't no thing here!! No thing!! There's you him and me!!
You mean countries that are acknowledged by the UN...or like made up countries too?
It's a dot on a map...
What I want to know is why the goddamn ocean is always cold...since I'm a kid I hate god damn cold water.
Hey! You hear me? Come out! Still no response.
I'm gonna kick your ass for putting me through this...
I'm not screwing around with you man...I hate the cold water.
What you talkin'? Samoa's a county!
This is not real! This is not bloody real!
I say we stay right here!
There's plenty of food here. We can hold out...someone'll rescue us...
We don't even know if his boat is still there...you saw Billy!
They're wipin' us out one at a time. I say we make a stand. Right here! Right now! Maximum firepower!
I'll kill you!! I'll fucking kill you!! I'll do it! I'll do it! I'm not playin' around here!
What the hell are you talking about?
At home we denosy the nosy.
I dunno where they came from, turned around and there they were.
No shit I'll keep my eyes open.
O.K. You want it that way...
The entire bridge electrical system is shutting down sir!
We have a main frame meltdown!!
